name: The Sims 3
description: Significantly improves performance by utilizing Vulkan
notes:
- Please install wine-staging from WineHQ to get all necessary dependencies.
- Use this command in terminal "xgamma -gamma 1.5" to adjust color gamma.
- It is highly suggested to install ErrorTrap, Traveler and Overwatch mods by nRaas to improve game's stability.
content:
files:
- d9vk:
    filename: d9vk-master.58669173dd95f00e800ce28f3caf03dd18512426.zip
    url: https://git.froggi.es/joshua/d9vk/-/jobs/456/artifacts/download
- origin: https://origin-a.akamaihd.net/Origin-Client-Download/origin/legacy/OriginThinSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-58669173/
    src: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet20 d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    arch: win64
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog
    description: Hiding annoying dialogs...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting version to xp...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Origin...
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe
    executable: origin
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-58669173
  esync: true
  version: ge-protonified-4.9-x86_64
